CustomField.formula:
CASE(Scale_Energy_Experience__c, "3yrs plus", 3, "2-3yrs", 2, "1-2yrs", 1, 0) +
CASE(Scale_Relevant_Degree__c, "Graduate degree", 3, "Specialization or relevant course work", 2, "Undergraduate or light course work", 1, 0) +
CASE(Scale_Project_Mgmt_Consulting__c, "3yrs plus", 3, "2-3yrs", 2, "1-2yrs", 1, 0) +
CASE(Scale_Project_Type_Knowledge_Skillset__c, "Experienced", 1, 0) +
CASE(Scale_Leadership__c, "Experienced", 1, 0) +
CASE(Scale_Written_Communication_Enthusiasm__c, "Superstar", 3, "Sufficient", 2, "Weak", 1,"Good/Great",1,0) +
CASE(Scale_Engineering_Technical__c, "Experienced",1,"Beginner", 1,"Intermediate",2,"Advanced",3,0)
CustomField.label: Applicant Score Criteria_OLD
